item.title: Need help with autotalker
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Your code doesn’t compile. Here is the fixed code for you.

program autotalker;

{.include SRL/SRL.scar}

const
msg1='buying bronze axe 20gp';//type what you want it to say here
msg2='buying bronze axe 20gp';//type what you want it to say here
msg3='buying bronze axe 20gp';//type what you want it to say here
msg4='buying bronze axe 20gp';//type what you want it to say here
msg5='buying bronze axe 20gp';//type what you want it to say here

procedure inputplayers;
begin
  HowManyPlayers := 3;
  numberofplayers (HowManyPlayers);
  currentplayer := 0;

    players[0].Name :=''; //username
    players[0].Pass :=''; //password
    players[0].Nick :=''; //first 3 letters of your name
    players[0].Active :=true; //do not touch

    players[1].Name :='';
    players[1].Pass :='';
    players[1].Nick :='';
    players[1].Active :=true;

    players[2].Name :='';
    players[2].Pass :='';
    players[2].Nick :='';
    players[2].Active :=true;

end;

procedure talk;
begin
  if(isFKeydown(11))then
     begin
       TypeSend(msg1 + chr(10))
     end;
end;

procedure autotalk2;
begin
  if(isFKeydown(2))then
     begin
        Typesend(msg2 + chr(10))
     end;
end;

procedure autotalk3;
begin
  if(isFKeydown(3))then
    begin
       Typesend(msg3 + chr(10))
    end;
end;

procedure autotalk4;
begin
  if(isFKeydown(4))then
    begin
       Typesend(msg3 + chr(10))
    end;
end;

procedure switch;
begin
  if(isFKeydown(5))then
    begin
      logout;
      NextPlayer(true);
    end;
end;

procedure alltalk;
begin
  //switch;
  talk;
  //talk;
  //talk;
  //talk;
end;

procedure aantiban;
var
 Antiban2 : integer;
begin
  if(not(loggedin))then exit;
  Antiban2 := random(130);
  case Antiban2 of
     1:RandomRClickEvery(2+Random(30));
     2:hoverskill('attack',false);
     3:hoverskill('mining',false);
     4:hoverskill('random',false);
     5:DoEmote(random(30));
     6:RotateEvery(30+Random(5));
  end;
end;

begin
setupsrl;
activateclient;
//inputplayers;
//loginplayer;
//wait(5);
   repeat
     alltalk;
     wait(5000)
   until(false)
end.

~Ron

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with autotalker
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

Like this?

[code]program autotalker;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
const
msg1=‘buying bronze axe 20gp’;//type what you want it to say here
msg2=‘buying bronze axe 20gp’;//type what you want it to say here
msg3=‘buying bronze axe 20gp’;//type what you want it to say here
msg4=‘buying bronze axe 20gp’;//type what you want it to say here
msg5=‘buying bronze axe 20gp’;//type what you want it to say here

procedure inputplayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers := 3;
numberofplayers (HowManyPlayers);
currentplayer := 0;

players[0].Name :=''; //username
players[0].Pass :=''; //password
players[0].Nick :=''; //first 3 letters of your name
players[0].Active :=true; //do not touch

players[1].Name :='';
players[1].Pass :='';
players[1].Nick :='';
players[1].Active :=true;

players[2].Name :='';
players[2].Pass :='';
players[2].Nick :='';
players[2].Active :=true;

end;

procedure talk;
begin
if(isFKeydown(11))then
begin
TypeSend(msg1 + chr(10))
end;
end;

procedure autotalk2;
begin
if(isFKeydown(2))then
begin
Typesend(msg2 + chr(10))
end;
end;

procedure autotalk3;
begin
if(isFKeydown(3))then
begin
Typesend(msg3 + chr(10))
end;
end;

procedure autotalk4;
begin
if(isFKeydown(4))then
begin
Typesend(msg3 + chr(10))
end;
end;

procedure switch;
begin
if(isFKeydown(5))then
begin
logout;
NextPlayer(true);
end;
end;

procedure alltalk;
begin
//switch;
talk;
//talk;
//talk;
//talk;
end;

const
aantiban

procedure aantiban;
var
aAAntiban:=integer;
begin
if(not(loggedin))then exit;
Antiban:=random(130);
case Antiban of
1:RandomRClickEvery(2+Random(30));
2:hoverskill(‘attack’,false);
3:hoverskill(‘mining’,false);
4:hoverskill(‘random’,false);
5:DoEmote(2Rrandom(30));
6:RotateEvery(30+Random(5));
end.

begin
setupsrl;
activateclient;
//inputplayers;
//loginplayer;
//wait(5);
repeat
alltalk;
wait(5000)
until(false)
end.[/code]

item.title: Need help with autotalker
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

Im making an autotalker and when i compiled i got a few errors.

[code]program autotalker;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
const
msg1=‘buying bronze axe 20gp’;//type what you want it to say here
msg2=‘buying bronze axe 20gp’;//type what you want it to say here
msg3=‘buying bronze axe 20gp’;//type what you want it to say here
msg4=‘buying bronze axe 20gp’;//type what you want it to say here
msg5=‘buying bronze axe 20gp’;//type what you want it to say here

procedure inputplayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers := 3;
numberofplayers (HowManyPlayers);
currentplayer := 0;

players[0].Name :=''; //username
players[0].Pass :=''; //password
players[0].Nick :=''; //first 3 letters of your name
players[0].Active :=true; //do not touch

players[1].Name :='';
players[1].Pass :='';
players[1].Nick :='';
players[1].Active :=true;

players[2].Name :='';
players[2].Pass :='';
players[2].Nick :='';
players[2].Active :=true;

end;

procedure talk;
begin
if(isFKeydown(11))then
begin
TypeSend(msg1 + chr(10))
end;
end;

procedure autotalk2;
begin
if(isFKeydown(2))then
begin
Typesend(msg2 + chr(10))
end;
end;

procedure autotalk3;
begin
if(isFKeydown(3))then
begin
Typesend(msg3 + chr(10))
end;
end;

procedure autotalk4;
begin
if(isFKeydown(4))then
begin
Typesend(msg3 + chr(10))
end;
end;

procedure switch;
begin
if(isFKeydown(5))then
begin
logout;
NextPlayer(true);
end;
end;

procedure alltalk;
begin
//switch;
talk;
//talk;
//talk;
//talk;
end;

procedure aantiban;
var
aAAntiban : integer;
begin
if(not(loggedin))then exit;
Antiban:=random(130);
case Antiban of
1:RandomRClickEvery(2+Random(30));
2:hoverskill(‘attack’,false);
3:hoverskill(‘mining’,false);
4:hoverskill(‘random’,false);
5:DoEmote(2Rrandom(30));
6:RotateEvery(30+Random(5));
end.

begin
setupsrl;
activateclient;
//inputplayers;
//loginplayer;
//wait(5);
repeat
alltalk;
wait(5000)
until(false)
end.[/code]

In line 88 it says “Identifier expected in script”,what should go into line 88?

Read full topic
